content:
gVL Staff Apr  

On April  Grand Valley State Universitys Physical Therapy Class of  will host the sixteenth Annual Wheel Run PERIOD Attendees will have the choice of either 5k or 10k as well as the option to walk run or hand cycle PERIOD The event will be  for GVSU students and  for nonstudents PERIOD Proceeds will go to Alternatives in Motion an organization that provides wheelchairs to individuals who do not qualify for other assistance and who cant obtain such equipment without financial aid PERIOD Participants are encouraged to register now at www.alternativesinmotion.orgwheelrun
